sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.

Social media is not my thing.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hello, I'm doing well. Just enjoying a cup of coffee and reading a book.
I'm reading the Harry Potter series again.
I love Harry Potter! I'm a big fan of the books and movies.
Me too! I've read the books multiple times and seen the movies even more.
What's your favorite book or movie in the series?
I think my favorite book is The Prisoner of Azkaban. And my favorite movie is the third one, too.
Those are both great choices. I like the third book and movie the best too.
I also love the seventh book and movie. They're so sad, but they're also really good.
Yeah, they're both really emotional. But they're also really well-written and acted.
I agree. I think the Harry Potter series is one of the best book and movie series ever made.
I agree! It's so well-written and it has such a great story.
I'm glad you agree. I'm always happy to meet someone who's a fan of Harry Potter.
Me too! It's nice to talk to someone who understands how great the series is.
Yeah, it's definitely one of my favorite series ever.
